rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能工具在个性化癌症治疗方面显示出前景，但落后于人类专家癌症治疗变得越来越复杂，但也提供了越来越多的可能性。毕竟，对肿瘤的生物学和遗传特征了解得越透彻，治疗方法就越多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-tools-show-promise-in-personalized-cancer-treatment-but-lag-behind- human-experts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-tools-show-promise-in-personalized-cancer-treatment-but-lag-behind- human-experts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=708fe83a-eea0-4afb-a628-a0dd0085d6ae Mon, 20 Nov 2023 19:33:07 -0500 AI tools show promise in personalized cancer treatment, but lag behind human experts
人工智能驱动的诊断工具显示出对少数民族女性的偏见佛罗里达大学的研究人员发现，旨在诊断影响女性的常见感染的机器学习算法在种族群体中表现出诊断偏差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-powered-diagnostic-tools-show-bias-against-women-from-ethnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/AI-powered-diagnostic-tools-show-bias-against-women-from-ethnic-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd17706a-1a36-4e9e-8de4-88c2bd6029da Mon, 20 Nov 2023 19:29:18 -0500 AI-powered diagnostic tools show bias against women from ethnic groups
研究发现老年人跌倒相关头部受伤后的随访和跌倒预防效果不佳在美国，跌倒是造成 65 岁及以上成年人致命和非致命伤害的主要原因。每年有四分之一的老年人跌倒，导致 27,000 人死亡、800 万人次急诊 (ED) 就诊和 80 万人次住院治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-finds-suboptimal-follow-up-and-fall-prevention-for-older-adults-after-fall-lated-head-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-finds-suboptimal-follow-up-and-fall-prevention-for-older-adults-after-fall-lated-head-injury.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04e15684-e8b1-43d5-9371-6de2248011a7 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 19:19:35 -0500 Study finds suboptimal follow-up and fall prevention for older adults after fall-related head injury
研究强调由于医疗过失导致止痛药依赖增加萨里大学的一项新研究表明，由于医疗专业人员缺乏警惕，人们对止痛药的依赖性正在上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-highlights-rise-in-pain-medication-dependence-due-to-medical-negligence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Study-highlights-rise-in-pain-medication-dependence-due-to-medical-negligence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1cfdb9e-b920-4183-9a11-cf1c656e3080 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 19:06:52 -0500 Study highlights rise in pain medication dependence due to medical negligence
年轻人可能更容易受到血液胆固醇升高和高血压的影响年轻人可能更容易受到动脉粥样硬化危险因素的影响。根据国家心血管研究中心 (CNIC) 进行的一项研究，年轻人特别容易受到血液胆固醇升高和高血压的破坏性影响，这是两个主要的可改变的心血管危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Young-people-may-be-more-susceptible-to-the-effects-of-elevated-blood-cholesterol-and-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Young-people-may-be-more-susceptible-to-the-effects-of-elevated-blood-cholesterol-and-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdec4bc9-ff42-4d1b-b822-231493d98e30 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 18:57:43 -0500 Young people may be more susceptible to the effects of elevated blood cholesterol and hypertension
ChatGPT 在回答鼻整形手术患者问题方面优于专家外科医生在一项新研究中，ChatGPT 形式的人工智能在回答与鼻部手术相关的术前和术后患者问题方面优于鼻整形外科医生专家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/ChatGPT-outperforms-expert-surgeon-in-answering-rhinoplasty-病人-questions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/ChatGPT-outperforms-expert-surgeon-in-answering-rhinoplasty-patent-questions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b7b982e-2fed-4ece-9ef0-b606b41a6e79 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 18:51:11 -0500 ChatGPT outperforms expert surgeon in answering rhinoplasty patient questions
首次研究揭示了脑出血形成的新元凶加州大学欧文分校领导的一项史无前例的研究揭示了脑出血形成的新罪魁祸首，该罪魁祸首并不像以前认为的那样涉及血管损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/First-of-its-kind-study-reveals-a-new-culprit-in-the-formation-of-brain-hemorrhages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/First-of-its-kind-study-reveals-a-new-culprit-in-the-formation-of-brain-hemorrhages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e66e2049-fcbc-4dbc-bac3-e1c0be1cc6db Mon, 20 Nov 2023 18:45:25 -0500 First-of-its-kind study reveals a new culprit in the formation of brain hemorrhages
新型唾液替代品可持久缓解口干根据实验室测试，一种旨在帮助口干患者的新型水性润滑剂技术比现有的市售产品有效四到五倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Novel-saliva-substitute-offers-long- permanent-relief-for-dry-mouth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Novel-saliva-substitute-offers-long- permanent-relief-for-dry-mouth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88082fce-d3fb-4596-a618-ea78a93e06f9 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 18:38:22 -0500 Novel saliva substitute offers long-lasting relief for dry mouth
基因组研究揭示了大麻使用障碍的潜在生物学原理耶鲁大学领导的一项对超过 100 万人基因组的分析揭示了大麻使用障碍的潜在生物学及其与精神疾病、滥用烟草等其他物质，甚至可能增加患肺癌风险的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Genomic-study-sheds-light-on-the-underlying-biology-of-cannabis-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Genomic-study-sheds-light-on-the-underlying-biology-of-cannabis-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5d9cf43-565a-4f96-9f01-f314f02d0a6d Mon, 20 Nov 2023 18:33:20 -0500 Genomic study sheds light on the underlying biology of cannabis use disorder
调查：超过三分之一的美国人担心呼吸道疾病的“三重流行”安纳伯格公共政策中心的一项新健康调查显示，超过三分之一的美国成年人担心他们或家人中的某人会在未来三个月内感染季节性流感、Covid-19 或 RSV（呼吸道合胞病毒） (APPC) 宾夕法尼亚大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Survey-Over-a-third-of-Americans-worry-about-the-tripledemic-of-respiratory-illnesses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Survey-Over-a-third-of-Americans-worry-about-the-tripledemic-of-respiratory-illnesses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c93e570-9b0f-4e16-9a75-0c29e2266ab3 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 18:27:43 -0500 Survey: Over a third of Americans worry about the "tripledemic" of respiratory illnesses
